entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,690Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 256

Summary: Dick Grayson decided that the Young Justice crew and the Titans needed a proper official meting, no missions, no explosions, just hanging out as a big group of friends… with some alcohol. They end up playing never have I ever and seven minutes in haven. Wally and Dick end up just a little too close in the closet and they now have to figure out what this thing between them is. The fic is filled with character dynamics, fluff, smut, crack, angst and heartbreak! - and it is currently ongoing BUT i post pretty regularly (at least one chapter a week).

entry.title: so will i
entry.summary:
Author: maemimi

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,298Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Superman gets used to fighting alongside Batman. Strategies unmatched and a wide set of knowledge about most necessary matters encountered in the bat’s path have put the man of steel’s rather stylized way of fighting in a more tranquil stance ever since they ever decided to join forces. They evolved into neat partners, able to perfectly comprehend their battlefield needs, and their personal ones too, never threading paths too far from one another even in their different areas– meaning, both geographically and morally.  And maybe that's why Clark's heart sank when he met Robin, scared, looking way too small in a cape and suit too big for him, eyes sparkling through his need to fight and to prove himself fit for the size of a hero the world needs him to be. Bold were his moves, and his ecstatic urge to live despite the pain he felt with every punch he received, just a few seconds before getting up again and dodging every next one.

entry.title: Follow your heart.. or don't
entry.summary:
Author: KnowledgeOrange

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,609Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Bruce is set to marry a woman he doesn't really love, nor she him. A series of irresponsible and dumb choices have led him to this- a forced marriage in order to save him and his family name from the growing PR mess.He doesn't have much choice in the matter, it's either he goes through with it and lives in a loveless marriage for however long is needed to ensure the safety of Wayne enterprises, or he refuses, and drags his family name down with him.Perhaps the choice would be an easier one, if it wasn't for Bruce's feelings for his straight best friend..or at least his best friend who he assumes to be straight.A battle of the heart and duty.
